Certainly! Here are some recommendations for books and TV shows that feature these sea monsters and creatures:

1. Percy Jackson and the Olympians series by Rick Riordan - This book series is based on Greek mythology and features many of the sea monsters and creatures we've discussed, including Charybdis, Scylla, and the Hydra.

2. The Heroes of Olympus series by Rick Riordan - This follow-up series to Percy Jackson and the Olympians also includes a number of sea creatures and monsters, including the giant sea serpent, Python.

3. Folk of the Air series by Holly Black - This book series features a number of mythical creatures, including mermaids, selkies, and kelpies.

4. Lost in Space - The Netflix series Lost in Space features a giant sea monster that attacks the Robinson family while they are stranded on a water planet.

5. Doctor Who - The long-running sci-fi TV show Doctor Who has featured a number of sea monsters and creatures over the years, including the Sea Devils and the Vashta Nerada, a swarm of predatory creatures that live in the shadows.

These are just a few examples of the many books and TV shows that feature these fascinating and terrifying sea monsters and creatures from ancient Greek mythology.
